Whitehaven: Made by Raven's Oak Dairy in Nantwich
Whitehaven is a white mould soft cheese
brine-salted and then sprayed with penicillium candidum white mould.
The curd - as with most goats' cheese - is brilliant white which softens as it ripens from the outside in.
It has a mild flavour in which only those with very sensitive taste buds could claim to detect the flavour associated with goat's milk.
